name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Robert Lee HAGOOD, Appellant

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, and MANDERINO, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Robert Lee HAGOOD, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Philip D. Freedman, Asst. Public Defender, Harrisburg, for appellant.
LeRoy S. Zimmerman, Dist. Atty., Marion E. MacIntyre, Second Asst. Dist. Atty., Reid H. Weingarten, Deputy Dist. Atty., Harrisburg, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
374 A.2d 693
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Robert Lee HAGOOD, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 27, 1977.
Decided July 8, 1977.
Philip D. Freedman, Asst. Public Defender, Harrisburg, for appellant.
LeRoy S. Zimmerman, Dist. Atty., Marion E. MacIntyre, Second Asst. Dist. Atty., Reid H. Weingarten, Deputy Dist. Atty., Harrisburg, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, and MANDERINO, JJ.
